getSlotItems

public List<IPSAssemblyItem> getSlotItems(IPSAssemblyItem item,
                                          IPSTemplateSlot slot,
                                          Map<String,Object> params)
                                   throws PSAssemblyException,
                                          PSFilterException,
                                          RepositoryException
Get the assembly items that go into the supplied slot of the supplied parent item.

Parameters:
item - parent item, must not be null.
slot - slot to load snippets for, must not be null/
params - additional parameters, may be null or empty.
Returns:
an array of zero or more ordered related slot items, never null, but may be empty
Throws:
PSAssemblyException
PSFilterException
RepositoryException
